about_the_game:
The Seal of Faith is optional and doesn’t impact gameplay — it’s simply a way for supporters to leave their mark in the world of Sin Slayers.

We've placed a special Foliant in the church where you can leave a message for anyone who opens it.

This DLC allows you to write a message that every player can read — a fun feature that serves as a seal for the true believers in our project.
